game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to slowly wither away. The people of Eridoria have lost hope.
game.ending: With the curse lifted and the world saved, the protagonist becomes known as a hero, restoring balance and prosperity to the land. A new era of peace and cooperation dawns on Eridoria.
game.synopsis: Players take on the role of a young adept who discovers they have the ability to wield magic, a long-lost art thought to be extinct. Guided by a wise old sage, they embark on a perilous journey across treacherous landscapes and ancient ruins to uncover the source of the curse: a powerful artifact created by an ancient civilization. Along the way, they must confront rival factions vying for control, battle fearsome creatures born from darkness, and unravel mysteries hidden within ancient lore.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
